sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sn_onesearch_searchers"> <sn_onesearch_searchers action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <additional_field_ids/> <additional_fields/> <additional_variables/> <always_visible>true</always_visible> <background_refresh>false</background_refresh> <count_badge>false</count_badge> <description>**Please copy the sample Searcher using the 'Copy Searcher' action before customizing your copy. **The original Searcher may be updated in future OneSearch versions, overwriting any changes.  Catalog Item/Record Producer searcher w/ verbose search results: -Requires adding a variable of type 'Macro' to the selected Catalog Item. The variable must use the 'onesearch_widget' macro. Place the variable where the results should display, usually beneath the variable that triggers the search.</description> <dynamic>true</dynamic> <field/> <field_id/> <form/> <hide_empty_sections>false</hide_empty_sections> <immediate_search>false</immediate_search> <item display_value="Create Incident">3f1dd0320a0a0b99000a53f7604a2ef9</item> <items_per_page>5</items_per_page> <max_results>10</max_results> <name>Sample record producer searcher</name> <new_only>true</new_only> <order>100</order> <page/> <page_url/> <paginate>false</paginate> <skin display_value="Classic Tabs">88a993ed4425420002addd3ec4bf4aea</skin> <sys_created_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-12-03 23:42:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>41a96bc10ff03100c8badf2be1050ea5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.hollifield@snc_SHARE</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-30 14:15:55</sys_updated_on> <type>catalog</type> <variable display_value="Please describe your issue below">3f272c500a0a0b990059c24380a2bc02</variable> </sn_onesearch_searchers> </record_update>
